item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Friday, January 10, 2025 at 11:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. I've acquired a new superpower (891 points | 359 comments)
2. Cuttle – a MTG like game using a standard 52 card deck (136 points | 44 comments)
3. Datadog acquires Quickwit (88 points | 36 comments)
4. Mercury's shadowy North Pole revealed by M-CAM 1 (41 points | 10 comments)
5. Meta's memo to employees rolling back DEI programs (539 points | 670 comments)
6. Finland's zero homeless strategy (2021) (84 points | 175 comments)
7. Formal Methods: Just Good Engineering Practice? (2024) (142 points | 82 comments)
8. Getting silly with C, part (void*)2 (107 points | 50 comments)
9. Doing Hard Things While Living Life: Why We Built Vade Studio in Clojure (85 points | 25 comments)
10. Show HN: TubePen – My attempt to get more out of YouTube learning (24 points | 12 comments)
11. Learning How to Think with Meta Chain-of-Thought (162 points | 42 comments)
12. Flattening ASTs (and Other Compiler Data Structures) (44 points | 8 comments)
13. Kimchi Refrigerator (11 points | 2 comments)
14. I got OpenTelemetry to work. But why was it so complicated? (154 points | 118 comments)
15. Stone selection by wild chimpanzees shares patterns with Oldowan hominins (23 points | 1 comment)
16. Phi-4 Bug Fixes (14 points | 3 comments)
17. OpenAI's bot crushed this seven-person company's web site 'like a DDoS attack' (72 points | 55 comments)
18. Visualizing All ISBNs (316 points | 95 comments)
19. The Tedious Heroism of David Ruggles (105 points | 12 comments)
20. Visualizing Dimensional Relationships (11 points | discuss)
21. The War Against Headlight Brightness (31 points | 24 comments)
22. Glimmer: DSL Framework for Ruby GUI and More (132 points | 21 comments)
23. Who Can Understand the Proof? A Window on Formalized Mathematics (163 points | 87 comments)
24. Show HN: Tetris in a PDF (1112 points | 206 comments)
25. Before Squid Game, there was Battle Royale (153 points | 229 comments)
26. Wasmer (YC S19) Is Hiring a Rust Engineer in EU timezone (Remote) ( | hide)
27. Experiments with Byte Matrix Multiplication (28 points | 3 comments)
28. Tactility: OS for the ESP32 Microcontroller Family (141 points | 39 comments)
29. Parsing the C64 Bubble Bobble Wind Currents (136 points | 24 comments)
30. Creates hyper-realistic voice clones from just 3 seconds of audio (24 points | 24 comments)
